item.title: Alabama-LSU, Texas A&M-Tennessee postponed
item.description: The Alabama-LSU and Texas A&M-Tennessee games, scheduled for Saturday, have been postponed due to COVID-19 issues within the Tigers and Aggies programs.

item.title: The journey of Tiger Woods' first Masters caddie, Tommy Bennett
item.description: The Augusta National veteran initially didn't want to carry for the up-and-comer in 1995, but together they made history. The caddie reflects on the fates that brought them together that week, and what he sees now as Woods readies his title defense.

item.title: Tommy Heinsohn, Hall of Famer with Celtics, dies
item.description: Tommy Heinsohn, who won 10 NBA titles over his 20 seasons as a player and coach for the Celtics, has died at the age of 86.

item.title: NFL owners approve playoff, diversity measures
item.description: NFL owners on Tuesday approved expanding the playoffs to 16 teams this season if games are canceled because of COVID-19 and also approved rewarding teams two third-round draft picks if they develop minority coaches and executives.

item.title: Tiger still gets chills thinking of '19 Masters win
item.description: Tiger Woods still gets chills when he thinks about his 2019 Masters victory.

item.title: Big Ben among 4 to go on Steelers' COVID list
item.description: Ben Roethlisberger is among four Steelers players, along with Jerald Hawkins, Jaylen Samuels and Vince Williams, to be added to the reserve/COVID-19 list Tuesday as a high-risk contact.

item.title: DeChambeau may use 48-inch driver for distance
item.description: Bryson DeChambeau might use a 48-inch driver to get even more distance off the tee.

item.title: England FA chief resigns after using racist phrase
item.description: null

item.title: Who can and cannot win the 2020 Masters
item.description: Who really has a shot to win this unique Masters? We got through every tier -- and you might be surprised where you'll find Tiger Woods.

item.title: Week 10 NFL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus new expectations for every team
item.description: The Bears hope to scrape out a playoff spot, while Miami thinks it can arrive early. And the Chiefs definitely still have Super aspirations.

item.title: 'He's like Superman': Revisiting Khalil Mack's incredible feats of strength at Buffalo
item.description: The former Buffalo linebacker went from lightly recruited high schooler to must-know MAC star during his collegiate career with the Bulls.

item.title: Heisman Watch: Mac Jones leads Justin Fields -- for now
item.description: Justin Fields passes Trevor Lawrence and closes in on Jones following Saturday's six-TD performance.

item.title: Contender Series: On three days' notice, an undefeated fighter will take his shot
item.description: Dana White's Contender Series features a last-minute catchweight bout, family ties and a collegiate wrestling standout.

item.title: Before the dynasty: Inside Bill Belichick's forgotten 2000 season with the Patriots
item.description: During his first season in New England, the Patriots played losing football at 5-11 but managed to change the direction of the franchise.

item.title: Big East predictions: UConn returns, resumes role as top dog
item.description: Does UConn's return to the Big East work for or against the rest of the league? Plus, DePaul and Villanova could have player of the year candidates.

item.title: Docs: La Russa charged with DUI after Feb. arrest
item.description: White Sox manager Tony La Russa was charged with driving under the influence in Arizona after he allegedly ran his car into a curb in February, according to court records obtained by ESPN. It is the second known drunken driving arrest for La Russa.

item.title: Sources: Nunes withdraws from UFC 256 bout
item.description: Amanda Nunes has withdrawn from her featherweight title defense against Megan Anderson.

item.title: Lindor AND Springer to the Mets? Ozuna to the Astros? Offseason predictions for all 30 teams
item.description: We look at what every team could do as baseball's offseason starts to get going.

item.title: UFC real or not: Could McGregor open 2021 against Gaethje instead of Poirier?
item.description: McGregor vs. Poirier isn't a done deal yet, so could Gaethje move in to face McGregor? Our panel weighs in.

item.title: Brook confident of Crawford upset by using size, experience to his advantage
item.description: Kell Brook has insisted he has not been distracted or concerned by weight issues ahead of facing Terence Crawford on Saturday.

item.title: NASCAR Cup championship only a matter of time for Chase Elliott
item.description: The son of NASCAR Hall of Famer Bill Elliott grew up with racing and with high expectations. Now just 24, Chase Elliott won in Phoenix to validate his place among the best.

item.title: USMNT planning gesture for racial justice - Tyler Adams
item.description: USMNT midfielder Tyler Adams said the team is planning to make some sort of gesture in support of racial justice prior to Thursday's friendly.

item.title: USMNT's Dest talks joining Barca, the U.S.'s World Cup ambitions
item.description: In an exclusive interview, Sergino Dest tells how the USMNT is primed for the World Cup.

item.title: Who are the MLS Cup playoff contenders?
item.description: Decision Day had its share of drama, but with the regular season now behind us, we turn our attention to grading out the 18 MLS Cup playoff teams.

item.title: Why more injuries and more games is no coincidence
item.description: Injuries are starting to mount up, and rather than having to play international games this week, what the top players really need is a rest.

item.title: How Valencia dismantled mighty Real Madrid
item.description: Valencia's upset of Real Madrid might just be the story of the year.

item.title: Man City, Liverpool flaws and fatigue boost title rivals
item.description: A clash of potential Premier League champions, but Man City and Liverpool looked short of their best.

item.title: F1 announces 23-race provisional 2021 calendar
item.description: Formula One has released its provisional 23-race 2021 calendar, featuring a new race in Saudi Arabia and a to-be-confirmed slot where the Vietnam Grand Prix was expected to be.

item.title: Top 15 games to play on Xbox Series X
item.description: Wondering what to play on the Xbox Series X? We've got you covered. After dedicating hundreds of hours playing some of the new games and titles available through Xbox Game Pass, here's our ranking of what you should play on the next-gen console.
